scripts.test-all: npm run test-main && npm run test-0.8 && npm run test-0.10 && npm run test-0.11
scripts.test: if [ -e $TRAVIS ]; then npm run test-all; else npm run test-main; fi
scripts.flag-doc-0.8: nave use 0.8 npm install && nave use 0.8 node ./scripts/gen-flag-doc > flags-0.8.md
scripts.flag-doc-0.10: nave use 0.10 npm install && nave use 0.10 node ./scripts/gen-flag-doc > flags-0.10.md
scripts.flag-doc-0.11: nave use 0.11 npm install && nave use 0.11 node ./scripts/gen-flag-doc > flags-0.11.md
scripts.flag-doc: npm run flag-doc-0.8 && npm run flag-doc-0.10 && npm run flag-doc-0.11
